about_the_game:
About the Game

Step into a world of sky-high warfare and strategic decision-making in this unique RTS experience. Command a fleet of powerful airships, navigating through non-linear campaigns where every choice matters. Fight to secure vital resources and save your people from an impending catastrophe by converting warships into civilian convoys after each mission.

Choose your next path from multiple mission options as you confront enemy factions, form alliances, and evolve your fleet. Deploy agents for covert operations and place operators on capital ships to enhance their abilities—both in battle and outside it.

Even failure is part of the journey. In this rogue-lite system, if you fail to save your people, the campaign restarts, but your strategic techs remain unlocked. Carry over your hard-earned advancements into your next playthrough, even when playing a different faction, allowing you to break the game’s balance in exciting and unpredictable ways.

Key Features:

  • Non-linear Campaign: Multiple mission choices per act, influencing your story and strategy.

  • Dynamic Factions & Relationships: Influence rival factions and antagonists with your choices, shaping the world around you.

  • Fleet Conversion Mechanic: Balance military power with the need to protect your people by transforming ships into civilian convoys.

  • Rogue-lite Replayability: Fail, restart, and retain your unlocked techs for a strategic advantage in future playthroughs.

  • Tactical Depth: Engage in airship combat with real-time fleet management and resource allocation.

  • Agent & Operator System: Influence the world and battlefield with agents and operators, bringing tactical and emotional depth.

  • Multiplayer Co-op and Skirmish Modes: Team up with friends in cooperative multiplayer or compete against others in fast-paced skirmishes to test your airship fleet strategies.

Secure the skies, protect your people, and rewrite your story on every attempt—how will you fare in this rogue-lite airship adventure?

  • Processor: 2.3 Ghz to 2.69 Ghz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

  • OS: Windows 11 64 bit
  • Processor: 2.3 Ghz to 2.69 Ghz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060

  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
